about_the_game:
The protagonist is asked to search for the Jewel of Clementia, which a legend says will be discovered by brave heroes. Selena and Lilly will accompany the protagonist for the journey. Together they will explore the beautiful world, collect information, obtain items, learn spells and search for the Jewel of Clementia.

Jewel of Clementia is an adventure game where players will freely explore the beautiful world. The game will surely give you the true sense of adventure.

Explore the beautiful world

Jewel of Clementia is a text based adventure game. The exploration system will let you explore the world. There are many choices players will make and what to do is up to you.

Relaxing world

The world is very relaxing. You will enjoy exploring the relaxing world. Jewel of Clementia is a peaceful adventure game crafted for exploration, relaxation and immersion. Jewel of Clementia is designed to offer players relaxing experiences.
